item.title: Publication
item.description: This is my [Google Scholar] 2019: Yan Zheng, Xiaofei Xie, Jianye Hao, el al., Wuji: Automatic Online Combat Game Testing Using Evolutionary Deep Reinforcement Learning, (ASE 2019). (pdf comming soon!) Yaodong Yang, Jianye Hao, Yan Zheng, el al., Large-Scale Home Energy Management Using Entropy-Based Collective Multiagent Deep Reinforcement Learning, (IJCAI 2019). [pdf] Tianpei Yang, Jianye Hao, Zhaopeng Meng, Chongjie Zhang, Yan Zheng, Ze Zheng, Efficiently Detecting and Optimally Responding Towards Sophisticated Opponents, (IJCAI 2019).
